attributes.action: Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election
attributes.additional_details: We feel that political parties can make whatever promises they want to get into power and are not held accountable. We think the people of Britain deserve to vote on genuine manifestos.
attributes.background: We think the people of Britain should have the chance to re-elect when parties break their manifesto promises.
